snippet.title: GTA IV records: fast cash, biggest budget, largest cast
snippet.description: ...Last year's Grand Theft Auto IV was a big game. You knew that. But what you might not know is that developer Rockstar spent and made faster cash on it than anything else, according to Guinness World Records. In addition to being the "most controversial" video game, Rockstar burned a record $100 million on GTA IV, "smashing the previous production record of $70 million set by S...
